TypeSignature.Value: public interface IURIResolver : Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IURIResolver implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type IURIResolver = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: An object that implements this interface that can be called by the processor to turn a URI used in document(), xsl:import, or xsl:include into a Source object.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public Javax.Xml.Transform.ISource Resolve (string href, string base);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Javax.Xml.Transform.ISource Resolve(string href, string base) cil managed
abstract member Resolve : string * string -> Javax.Xml.Transform.ISource

Docs.param: An href attribute, which may be relative or absolute.
The base URI against which the first argument will be made absolute if the absolute URI is required.
Docs.summary: Called by the processor when it encounters an xsl:include, xsl:import, or document() function.
Docs.returns: A Source object, or null if the href cannot be resolved, and the processor should try to resolve the URI itself.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs when trying to resolve the URI.
